00006 #include "maven.h"
00007 #include "struct_MavenNamespace.h"
00008 #include "struct_MavenCompiler.h"
00009 #include "struct_MavenObject.h"
00010 #include "namespaces.h"
00011 #include "keywords.h"
00012 
00013 void pushNamespace(MavenCompiler* c, string namespaceName) {
00014         c->currentNamespace = namespaceName;
00015         
00016         // because namespaces can popup multiple times, if a namespace exists just ignore
00017         if(findNamespaceID(c, namespaceName) < 0) {
00018                 MavenNamespace* ns = new MavenNamespace();
00019                 ns->name = namespaceName;
00020                 
00021                 // always push the nil class
00022                 MavenObject* o = new MavenObject();
00023                 o->name = MAVEN_BARE_CLASS;
00024                 extendObject(c, o, "maven.Object");
00025                 
00026                 ns->objects->push(o);
00027                 c->namespaces->push(ns);
00028         }
00029 }
